bibl.title: Five Ostraca from Oxford.
bibl.note: Five ostraca kept at the Papyrology Rooms, Sackler Library, Oxford (property of the Egypt Exploration Society). Presumably bought on the antiquities market by Grenfell and/or Hunt. - 1. O. E.E.S. Inv. 1. Granary Receipt. Memnoneia, 14 August 110 BC? - 2. O. E.E.S. Inv. 2. Note for delivery of wine. Arsinoite (?), first century BC. - 3. O. E.E.S. Inv. 3. Receipt for weaver's tax. Koptos (?), 25 June 9 BC. - 4. O. E.E.S. Inv. 4. Receipt for poll-tax. Syene / Elephantine, 7 July 27. - 5. O. E.E.S. Inv. 5. Receipt for transportation of grain. Euhemeria, third century.
GONIS Nikolaos, Five Ostraca from Oxford.
